resources.string: Refers to the total amount of light that plants receive. It is also described as the degree of brightness that a plant is exposed to.\n

ul.li:
2152 - 5381 LX
 Not appropriate for most plants.

5381 - 10763 LX
 This light intensity is appropriate for shade-loving plants.

10763 - 21527 LX
 Appropriate for plants that require indirect sunlight.

21527 - 43055 LX
 It is ideal for many plants that require good and consistent light intensity.

43055 - 53819 LX
 Appropriate for plants that require a lot of strong light.
